description: Searches for a pattern in a text using a regular expression.

input.name: text
input.description: The text value to be searched.

input.name: pattern
input.description:
The text or a regular expression to be replaced.
Regular expressions must be wrapped with `/` character (e.g. `/.*/`).

input.name: ignore case
input.description:
Whether lowercase and uppercase letters should be treated as equivalent. 
If unspecified, defaults to `True`.

output.name: match
output.description: Whether the given text matches the pattern.
